name: "Sabrina" Bow Gold
description:
Just in time for the holidays!  

We have added a little sparkle to one of our best selling hats.

The Sabrina bow hat now has GOLD.

Hand knit
Acrylic
Sizes: XS, Small and Medium

Because we all know...."Gold is best"

name: "Lucy" Striped Baby Beanie Boy or Girl
description:
Pink and Blue available  only in XSmall or 0-3 months.

Red and White available in XSmall or Small.  The yarn on the red and white hat is a bit "chunkier" and has more of a hand made look.

Perfect newborn gift or for photos.

Currently available in Navy/Sky and Pink/White

100% Cotton

name: "Finn" Anchor Hat
description:
The "Finn" hat features a classic anchor, the bold symbol for all things nautical.  Still soft and sweet for little one's with a monochromatic color scheme.

Available in XS and Small.

name: "Carson" Tweed Fedora
description:
Perfect for fall photos.  This accessory will take your little boy through fall and winter in style.

Tweed Fedora available in XS, Small and Medium

name: "Booker" Straw Fedora
description:
For summer picnic's and stroll's in the park.  Our Booker Straw fedora comes in 3 sizes to fit even the littlest guys head.

Available with blue stripes or brown.

Please measure for the best fit

XS 46cm
Small  50cm
Medium 54cm

name: "Bree" Stripes and Flowers Beanie
description: The "Bree" beanie is a fun striped hat with flowers.  Show off your little one's personality with this eclectic hat.

name: "LaLa" Leopard Hat
description:
Leopards show a great diversity in coat color.  In general, the coat color varies from pale yellow to deep gold or tawny, and is patterned with black rosettes. 

...All we know is that leopard print is HOT!

Get it now in sizes XS, Small and Medium.
100% Icelandic Acrylic
Hand knit

name: "Hattie Gray" and Citron Bow Beanie
description:
The "Hattie" is a cute striped bow beanie in contemporary colors of yellow and gray with a retro vibe.  Light gray stripes and a citron bow make this perfect for your little darling.

Hand knit in 100% Icelandic Acrylic

name: "Sophie" Giraffe in Brown or Pink
description:
Just in!  Sweet Sophie Giraffe hat.

Giraffes have beautiful spotted coats. While no two individuals have exactly the same pattern, giraffes from the same area appear similar.  Who knew?

Hand knit in soft icelandic acrylic.  XS fits newborns, small fits 3-12 months.

name: "Daisy" Mohair bonnet
description: This soft mohair bonnet has a sweet daisy pattern.  Newborn size only, but available in pink, tan or chocolate brown.

name: "Beck" Raw Edge Canvas Driving Cap Hat
description:
Shade your face in style.  A great alternative to a baseball cap.

Cotton canvas with  contrast stitching makes a great looking ivy cap.  Frayed edges add to the rugged look.

Get trendy with our gray canvas and neon green stitching or stay traditional with gray canvas and white stitching.

The Blueberry Hill has the most stylinâ€™ hats around. 

XS 46 cm
Small 50 cm
Medium 54 cm
Large  58 cm

name: "Bella" Handknit Cupcake Hat
description:
Sweet little Bella cupcake hat.  Chenille yarn makes up the frosting and a white pom pom is the cherry on top.  

100% acrylic yarn

XS fits newborns
Small fits 3-9 months.

name: "Wilbur" Aviator Hat with Goggles
description:
Sporty and unique, the "Wilbur" aviator hat is ideal for your little flyer.

100% soft acrylic yarn


XSmall fits newborns

Small fits approximately 3 months- 2years

name: "Otis" Owl Hat for Babies and Kids
description:
Whoo doesn't love owls?

Owl hats are 100% acrylic.

XS fits newborns
Small fits 6 months up to 8 years (believe it or not!)

Sky Blue (currently out of stock)
Navy Blue (currently out of stock)
White with Brown Tassels
Pink with Green Tassels
Gray with Sky Tassels

name: "Goldie" Fish in Bag hat
description:
Do you remember going to the fair and winning a fish in a bag?

The "Goldie" hat takes me back to summer days at the carnival, playing ring toss and hoping to win a goldfish like my big brother.

Now we can all be winners!

XS fits newborns
Small fits 3-18 months

name: "Jake" Linen Preppy Fedora
description:
The "Jake" fedora is for your little prepster.  Light tan linen with a striped band.

Available in:

XSmall -48cm
Small-52cm
Medium- 54cm

please measure for the best fit.

name: "Sam" Brown Bear hat with earflaps and pompoms
description:
Sam couldn't get enough of the pom poms on the ends of the ear flaps.  

  The "Sam" brown bear hat is available in size Xsmall and Small.  XSmall is best for newborns and Small  its most 6 months -2T.

Sam is now available in cream in size XS only!

Adorable for newborn or toddler photographs and has the added benefit of actually keeping your child warm and cute on chilly days.  100% soft acrylic yarn

name: "Julian" Cable bear in brown, pink or tan
description:
Cute cable knit pattern with sweet little ears.  

Pink
Tan
Brown

XS newborns
Small fits approximately 3-18 months.

name: "Claire" Pixie Hat
description:
The sweetest hat you'll ever see.  

Size Small only, fits approximately 3-12 months.  

100 percent acrylic.  Hand knit cable pixie hat with chin strap.

Perfect little Bonnet.

name: "Ben" Mohawk Hat in Gray, Navy and PINK
description:
Perfect for the little rock star.

Available in Gray and Navy and Pink (Currently sold out of Gray and Pink)

Size Small fits approximately 6-18 months

Size XS fits newborn

name: "Maggie" Cotton Newborn Hat
description:
100% Cotton in 2012's hottest spring/summer colors.  Fits newborn only.

Flower shown is not included.

Available in: 

Canary Yellow
Robin Egg Blue
Carnation Pink
Wisteria

name: "Kate" newborn bonnet
description:
Sweet soft little bonnet available in Tan, Gray or Green.  Flower shown in modeled photo not included.

Size XS only for newborn babies.

name: "Oliver" Blue and Brown Plaid Fedora for Adults and Children
description:
Blue and Brown Plaid Fedora's for The Blueberry Hill.

  I love fedora's on little boys.  And big boys.  They are just so smooth and "rockabilly". 

This hat is currently only available in large.

name: "Lacey" Mohair Bonnet
description:
Soft and sweet for photos or christening this lacy mohair bonnet makes the perfect gift.  One size only (newborn or XS).

Now available in pink

Flower Clip not included

name: "Ruby" Ruffle Hat
description:
The "Ruby" Ruffle hat is our newest look for fashion forward infants.

XS fits its 0-3 months.  

Small fits 3-18 months (depending on head size!)

Satin Flower clip not included.

name: "Jasmine" Beanie in Black
description:
So versatile, you'll want to wear it everyday.

Size Medium  Fits Approx 2-4 years.

name: "Jasmine"  Beanie in Aqua
description:
The Jasmine beanie is made of soft 100% Acrylic Icelandic yarn and stretches to fit a variety of head sizes.

Medium Fits Approximately ages 2-4
Large Fits 4- Adult.

name: "Emi" Neapolitan Hat
description:
The Emi Neapolitan hat is appropriately named.  It looks good enough to eat on a cone.

Available in sizes XS and Small

XS fits approximately 3-12 months.  Small fits approximately 6-24 months.

100% soft acrylic yarn

name: "Riley" Pink Sock Monkey Hat
description:
This adorable hat has pompoms and panache.   Darling for warmth or just cute photos.

If in doubt, size up!

100% soft acrylic yarn.

name: "Adelaide" Cabel Knit Pom Pom Hat
description:
Just perfect for your ski vacation in Park City or Vail.  Soft cable knit with ear flaps and pom poms.

Available in Gray, Blue Curacao, Cream and Chocolate.

Fits approximately 2-5 years.

name: "Rose" Crochet flower hat
description:
The "Rose" is a crocheted cotton hat with ear flaps and an adorable rose adornment.

XS is for newborns

Small fits 6 months-2 1/2 years (depending on head size)

name: "Cooper" Tweed Driving Cap
description:
For fall, tweed is a fashion "must". The "Cooper" Driving hat is comfortable, casual and stylish.

You need tweed.

Available in Small, Medium and Large.  Please measure for the best fit.

Small- 48cm 6-18 months
Medium- 52cm 18 months-3 years
Large- 54cm 3-5 years.

Please measure for the best fit.

name: "Jackson" Fedora in Gray
description:
Fedora hats were born in the late 1800's, as a fashion accessory to depict the upper-class.  In the 21st century, the "Jackson" hat depicts "kids who rock."

Currently only available in size: LARGE (58cm) fits size 8 and up.

Please measure for the best fit.

name: "Penelope" Red and White Polka Dot Fedora
description:
It takes some attitude to be able to rock this fedora.  Red with white polka dots--

Just one size left: (57cm)

Please measure for the best fit.

name: "Dexter" Chevron Hat for Newborns
description:
It's no wonder chevron patterns are all the rage.  They are chic modern and fun.

Only for the littlest ones, the Dexter chevron hat is available in Gray/White, Berry/Taupe or Brown/Cream.

name: "Megan" Wool Cabby Hat
description:
Bad hair day?

Gray wool cabby hat with your choice of flower color.  

Inside of heat measures 57cm.  Please measure to ensure correct fit.

Fits most ages 8 and up.

name: "Sabrina" Bow hat in Gray and Cream
description: Just in!  Sweet little hand knit bow beanie.  Available in XS for newborns and Small for up to 1 year.

name: "Sabrina" Bow hat in Pink and Cream
description:
Sweet little hand knit bow beanie.  

Hand knit from 100% soft acrylic yarn.

Available in XS for newborns and Small for up to 1 year.

Available in Pink with cream bow or the reverse.

name: "Quinn" newborn cable pom pom hat
description:
The "Quinn" is back in stock!  Now available in chocolate, ivory, pink and baby blue (not pictured).

Fits newborns or 0-3 months (XSmall) and bigger 3-18 months (Small)

name: "Avery" Photography Prop Crown
description:
Sweet little crown sized for newborns.  Avery means "Elf Ruler" and we think it is the perfect name for this tiny crown.

Just right for sweet little newborn photographs.

name: "Bailey" Bunny hat
description:
Our sweet new hand knit bunny hat comes in Xsmall for the newborns and small for children 3-12 months.  Medium fits 12 months to approx 4 years.

Gray or pink ears for your little rabbit.

100% acrylic yarn.

name: "Max" Knit Sock Monkey Hat
description:
Adorable hand knit sock monkey hat for boys or girls.  Very stretchy and soft 100% acrylic yarn. 


 Don't be afraid to "go big" when ordering.

name: "Henry" Rust Colored Fedora
description:
Fedora hats were born in the late 1800's, as a fashion accessory to depict the upper-class.  In the 21st century, the "Henry" hat depicts "kids who rock."


Please measure for the best fit.

Currently only available in size LARGE (58cm)

name: "Mia" Fun Floral Girl's Ivy Cap Hat
description:
This fun girly print will not only shade your little girl--it will set her apart from the crowd.  

Why wear a boring hat?

Made from lightweight cotton.

One size fits about 2-7 year olds.

name: "Brad" Olive Driving Hat
description:
My husband swears by this hat.  He claims it is cool and comfortable.  

Only size "Large" is left.  This size usually fits 8 and up.

measures:  58 cm

name: "Kristin" Butterfly Fedora
description:
The Kristin fedora is nothing if not unique.  It was named after a girl who likes to wear hats all the time.  Especially at the pool.

Are you unique enough to wear a monarch butterfly fedora?

One size only: 57 cm.  Can fit adults and children, but please measure the intended's head for the best fit.

name: "Elliot" Panda hat
description:
Did you know the panda's diet is over 99% bamboo?  Feed your panda love with the "Elliot" panda hat.


Medium fits 4 years to adult

name: Gift Certificate
description:
Surprise that special someone with a gift certificate from The Blueberry Hill.

After your purchase you will receive an emailed gift certificate including a code for the recipient to use at checkout.

Any dollar amount is available, just send a message and we will set it up for you.
